channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- DP300, RP200, TE30, TE40, TE50, TE60
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- DP300, RP200, TE30, TE40, TE50, TE60

item.title: CVE-2017-17310|2024-08-05T20:51:30.703Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- dp300%2C%20rp200%2C%20te30%2C%20te40%2C%20te50%2C%20te60
item.description: Electronic Numbers to URI Mapping (ENUM) module in some Huawei products DP300 V500R002C00, RP200 V600R006C00, TE30 V100R001C10, V500R002C00, V600R006C00, TE40 V500R002C00, V600R006C00, TE50 V500R002C00, V600R006C00, TE60 V100R001C10, V500R002C00, V600R006C00 have a buffer error vulnerability. An unauthenticated, remote attacker has to control the peer device and send specially crafted ENUM packets to the affected products. Due to insufficient verification of some values in the packets, successful exploit may cause buffer error and some services abnormal.

item.title: CVE-2017-17308|2024-08-05T20:51:30.591Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- dp300%2C%20rp200%2C%20te30%2C%20te40%2C%20te50%2C%20te60
item.description: SCCPX module in Huawei DP300 V500R002C00, RP200 V500R002C00, V600R006C00, TE30 V100R001C10, V500R002C00, V600R006C00, TE40 V500R002C00, V600R006C00, TE50 V500R002C00, V600R006C00, TE60 V100R001C10, V500R002C00, V600R006C00 has an invalid memory access vulnerability. An unauthenticated, remote attacker may send specially crafted packets to the affected products. Due to insufficient validation of packets, successful exploit may cause some services abnormal.

item.title: CVE-2017-17282|2024-08-05T20:44:00.050Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- dp300%2C%20rp200%2C%20te30%2C%20te40%2C%20te50%2C%20te60
item.description: SCCP (Signalling Connection Control Part) module in Huawei DP300 V500R002C00, RP200 V500R002C00, V600R006C00, TE30 V100R001C10, V500R002C00, V600R006C00, TE40 V500R002C00, V600R006C00, TE50 V500R002C00, V600R006C00, TE60 V100R001C10, V500R002C00, V600R006C00 has a buffer overflow vulnerability. An attacker has to find a way to send malformed packets to the affected products repeatedly. Due to insufficient input validation, successful exploit may cause some service abnormal.

item.title: CVE-2017-17314|2024-08-05T20:51:30.553Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- dp300%2C%20rp200%2C%20te30%2C%20te40%2C%20te50%2C%20te60
item.description: Huawei DP300 V500R002C00, RP200 V600R006C00, TE30 V100R001C10, V500R002C00, V600R006C00, TE40 V500R002C00, V600R006C00, TE50 V500R002C00, V600R006C00, TE60 V100R001C10, V500R002C00, V600R006C00 have an invalid memory access vulnerability. An unauthenticated attacker has to find a way to send malformed SCCP messages to the affected products. Due to insufficient input validation of some values in the messages, successful exploit may cause buffer error and some service abnormal.
